front.title: Domain name system-based electronic mail security

author.organization: Information Technology Laboratory (National Institute of Standards and Technology)

front.abstract: This document describes a security platform for trustworthy email exchanges across organizational boundaries. The project includes reliable authentication of mail servers, digital signature and encryption of email, and binding cryptographic key certificates to sources and servers. The example solutions and architectures presented here are based upon standards- based open-source and commercially available products.
